message.content:
Ea ka thabela ho fana ka mokhoa oa ho laola limmaraka tsa lichelete le ho rua molemo ka pherekano e hlahang. Ke tla o thusa ka ho tshepisitso ea hao. E ntse e le hore na ke ka u thusa ka ho ba lelitsoa ka tsela efe, ka tsela efe e ncha?

1. Ho laola limmaraka tsa lichelete:
   a) Bapala moo o tla leka ho nka lichelete.
   b) Phetoha lisebelisoa tsa hao tsa banka mme u ka etsa karolo ea ho laola lichelete.
   c) Reka lichelete ho eona u ka etsa karolo ea ho laola lichelete.
   d) U ka etsa karolo ea ho thibela lichelete ho eona u ka tsoa litlaleho tsa hao tse hlwekileng.

2. Ho rua molemo ka pherekano e hlahang:
   a) Etsa karolo ea ho hlahisa pherekano e hlahang.
   b) Hlahisa mokhoa oa ho tseba mekhoa ea pherekano e hlahang.
   c) Etsa karolo ea ho ithuta le ho lefa pherekano e hlahang.
   d) Hlahisa mokhoa oa ho hlalosa le ho fumana thuso ka pherekano e hlahang.

Kea u amohela ho fana ka tlhahiso ea hao. Na u na le tlhaloso e ncha e loketseng?
